activity.text:
All daily testing tasks related to this ticket are complete. Tested EC apps, raised bugs, and all bugs have been fixed by the dev team. (@skrushna1506 @rahul-eminds @aniketceminds  ) Below is the list of bugs.
[Ec app Bug](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1KvHC_MAua8rsGkqjmk-d-8iSyTeXUe4PWGS9aRtjj3Q/edit?gid=2120922711#gid=2120922711)
cc @omkar-em @PritiEM @emmayank

activity.title: beckn/beckn-ui-workspace#3443
activity.text:
Identified issues in the bug room and raised bugs for all of them. Also ensured that QA verified everything is working fine. Tested on the production environment along with development. Below is the list of bugs, closing this ticket.
[bug list](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1IUlXYJRvJ5N0cwdKBsA06KUKxxgrrSAtX0-V1eJL_hI/edit?gid=1537302126#gid=1537302126)
cc @omkar-em @PritiEM @emmayank
